name: Printer Extension
body:
# Printer Extension
[Load extension in ScratchX](http://scratchx.org/?url=http://mrcomputer1.github.io/PrinterExtension/printerextension.js)

[Source Code](http://github.com/Mrcomputer1/PrinterExtension/blob/gh-pages/printerextension.js)

[Issue Tracker](http://github.com/Mrcomputer1/PrinterExtension/issues) - Suggestions are also put here

# Blocks

%s = \[\]

%n = \(\)

%m = \[ v\]

## Print HTML %s
Print HTML %s="TEXT TO PRINT HTML SUPPORTED"

## Print Image %s
Print Image %s="IMAGE TO PRINT"

# How it works?

It opens a page with the contents to print then runs JavaScript window.print(); to print it!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
